snippet.title: BADLADS - Official Reveal Trailer | MASSIVE CITY RP
snippet.description:
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/hqZVQmm
Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1200710
Check out the website: https://badlads.chemicalheads.com

SOCIAL MEDIA:
Reddit: https://reddit.com/r/playbadlads
Twitter: https://twitter.com/playbadlads
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/chemicalheads

BADLADS - Massive Open World City Roleplay.
Rise through the government to become the vicious President that you always wanted to be! Play on the field as a Police Officer, fighting against the gangs. Make your own gang and overthrow the government! Explore the world and buy yourself the apartment you always deserved, and of course park your car. 

Game developed by: Chemical Heads Studios (https://twitter.com/chemicalheads) 

Weapons foley by (Michel Baradari) under https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ 
Music composed by Janis Grikis.
https://www.instagram.com/janisgrix/
https://www.facebook.com/janis.grikis.9
